summary: A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.
cast: Louis de Funès|Yvonne Clech|Jean-Pierre Marielle|Anne Doat|Georges Wilson|Jean Valmont|Claude Piéplu|Georges Adet|Florence Blot|Nicole Chollet|Alix Mahieux|Michel Dancourt|André Badin|Louis Viret|Guy Grosso|Yvonne Rozille|Catherine Demongeot|Michel Tureau|Jean Lefebvre|Henri Attal|Max Desrau|Colin Drake|Jean Droze|Philippe Dumat|Yves Elliot|Robert Favart|Dominique Marcas|Myriam Michelson|Johnny Monteilhet|Dominique Zardi
title: El gran golpe
